column5: http://www.ticketmaster.ca/event/110...minorcatid=105 i used to always stop at rangers booth and talk to steve and have ice fished with mike a few times weekend before boat show craig will collecting fish for the fish tank again on the red....a few waam club members will be helping him out manitoba .... a 100,000 lakes how many walleyes ???? i will never have enough time....
Boat show Feb 23rd laurent fyi.Change the date i want to go lol.Team Ranger Merc
The dates Good nothing but Tin boats at the boat show anyway????
Hey old Red im workin in the Ranger booth and they are glass and i think they will have a few glass lunds there also.Take Care
You mean Hillside both & the Lund Will still not have the Tournament glass boats at the show???
you never know what will show up at the boat show?, Team Lund
Tony....Actually I think it was me you are refering to who you met last year ice fishing at Craigs. I also helped launching and on the the docks at RRWC. Good luck with the Pine Falls Derby.

Hey guys/gals I'm going to put on a Ice Fishing tournament at the Pine Falls Dock Saturday Feb 23/08 10am-4pm. I will post the details in the next couple of days. Entry forms will be made available online. Entry fee will be $55.00 Per hole, 50.00 will go to cash prizes 5.00 will go toward expenses. All prizes will be in cash.
think that's the boat show weekend laurent..... but you probably know that... manitoba .... a 100,000 lakes how many walleyes ???? i will never have enough time....
Hey laurent tourney above lock or below also is there ice out on the lake and are they letting any water out thinking of bringing some guys out first weekend january.

Below the dam, Pine Falls boat launch........... Ice is good lake is frozen over. Some parts of the river are open, water spilling like crazy but Ice will be good at launch. Stay away from Starrs and mill discharge. Greenbacks should be there it never slowed down............. Hope they are still there in feb.

Laurent, Send me an email with your number don't have it any more [email protected] about 8 of us are going to comr up around the 3rd of january then keep your schedule open so you can go out to the lake with us. Randy
Hey Laurent. Could you let me know if or when the spillway stops dumping. Thanks.
Boat show is always first weekend of March from what i know.Team Ranger Merc
Boat show is always first weekend of March from what i know.Team Ranger Merc
usually tony what i hear is it is moved up this is the reason the cancer marathon at gimli is moved back manitoba .... a 100,000 lakes how many walleyes ???? i will never have enough time....
What date is the boat show?I forgot your name your the guy i met at Craigs place ice fishing last winter.Take care Tony Team Ranger Merc
